REQUEST.YOUR_QUOTE_REQUEST_WILL_BE_TRACKED_NOTIF: Your quote request will be tracked and you'll receive notifications about responses.

REQUEST.SUBMITTING_ANONIMOUS_QUOTE_REQUEST: Submitting Anonymous Quote Request is not possible at the moment!
REQUEST.YOU_CANT_SUBMIT_QUOTE_REQUEST_WITHOUT_LO: You can't submit a quote request without logging in. However, creating an account allows you to track your requests and receive faster responses.
REQUEST.PROJECT_REQUIREMENTS_INFO: Provide detailed information about your project requirements
REQUEST.PROJECT_DESCRIPTION_HELPER: Be as specific as possible to receive accurate quotes. Include dimensions, materials, finish requirements, etc.
REQUEST.JOB_LOCATION_HELPER: Include city, state/province, and any specific location details (e.g., "123 Main St, New York, NY" or "Downtown Construction Site")
REQUEST.REVIEW_DESCRIPTION: We review your request within 2 business hours
REQUEST.MATCH_DESCRIPTION: We connect you with qualified vendors
